content: the pattern is also in more detail with pictures on my blog link below a quick knit for using up left-over yarn featuring a pine needle motif that is written in chart designed for a 8 x 13 hot water bottle for my mc i used 2 strands held together of artesano alpaca 4 ply about 3/4 of each skein and worked the motif with a tiny amount less than a 1/4 skein of all american wool in spruce from swans island
